name: Mental Health Support Services
description: The Trauma Recovery Center provides free mental health and support services to adults (aged 18 years and older) living in San Francisco.
fullDescription: The Trauma Recovery Center provides free mental health and support services to adults (aged 18 years and older) living in San Francisco.
whatTheyOffer: The Trauma Recovery Center provides free mental health and support services to adults (aged 18 years and older) living in San Francisco who are survivors of the following: - Domestic violence - Sexual assault - Physical assault - Criminal motor vehicle accidents - Gang-related violence - Loss of a loved one to homicide Services include: - Individual and group psychotherapy - Case management - Trauma-informed psychiatry Eligibility: - Not currently receiving mental health services anywhere else H
address: 2727 Mariposa Street, Suite 100, San Francisco, CA, 94110
